mapper.select: SELECT rd.id,rd.receipt_id, rd.prod_id,p.prod_no,p.prod_name,rd.prod_amount,ven.name vendor_name, rd.status,rd.create_by,rd.create_time,rd.update_by,rd.update_time FROM t_wms_storage_out_detail_record rd LEFT JOIN t_wms_receipt_record rp on rp.id = rd.receipt_id and rp.del_flag ='1' LEFT JOIN t_wms_product p on p.id = rd.prod_id and p.del_flag ='1' LEFT JOIN t_wms_vendor ven on ven.id = p.vendor_id and ven.del_flag ='1' WHERE rd.del_flag='1' and rp.receipt_no =#{receiptNo}

SELECT rd.id,rd.receipt_id,rp.receipt_no,rp.apply_id,rp.operator_id,rp.apply_id,rp.apply_date, rd.prod_id,p.prod_no,p.prod_name,p.type prod_type, rd.prod_amount,ven.name vendor_name, rg.region_name, rd.status,rd.create_by,rd.create_time,rd.update_by,rd.update_time FROM t_wms_storage_out_detail_record rd LEFT JOIN t_wms_receipt_record rp on rp.id = rd.receipt_id and rp.del_flag ='1' LEFT JOIN t_wms_product p on p.id = rd.prod_id and p.del_flag ='1' LEFT JOIN t_wms_vendor ven on ven.id = p.vendor_id and ven.del_flag ='1' LEFT JOIN t_wms_storages_region rg on rg.id = rp.region_id and rg.del_flag ='1' WHERE rd.del_flag='1'
and rp.regionId =#{query.regionId}
